title: Toronto JS Town Hall
details:
Details
-------

The organizers of Toronto JS, @mihok and @jenc, are running a town hall to update the community on upcoming plans, including:

*   our updated respective visions for the community
*   our new and ongoing code of conduct and what it means
*   volunteering for Toronto JS
*   open forum for how this community is doing

All are welcome! This event is more geared towards organization matters and not a networking or social unlike JS Code Club and JS Social.

ü•ÅDo you wanna be more involved and help with running Toronto JS? Do you feel strongly about this community or want to help move it in a better direction? Come forth!
